original_text: Then the Lord said to him, ‘Take off the sandals from your feet, for the place where you are standing is holy ground.
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 네 발의 신을 벗으라 네가 서 있는 곳은 거룩한 땅이니라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to him
Take off the sandals from your feet
for the place where you are standing is holy ground
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 서 있는 곳은 거룩한 땅이니라
